0.user_question: Mark has $50 in his bank account. He earns $1736265 per day at his work. If he wants to buy a bike that costs $300, how many days does Mark have to save his money?

direct_answer.text: Let's think step by step. Mark has $50. So in 3 days, he can earn $200. In 4 days, he can earn $400. If he wants to buy a bike that costs $300, it will cost him $200 + $300 = $500. He will have $500 + $200 = $800. Mark has $800 + $50 = $850. He can save for 5 days and will have $850 - $200 = $550 left. So Mark will have to save $550 + $50 = $1000. 1000 - $850 = $50.
